actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt cooperative housing corporations, condominium management associations, and residential real estate management associations from taxation on certain types of income.

summary.text: Provides that a cooperative housing association shall be taxable in the same manner as a corporation under the Internal Revenue Code, except that income received from the following sources shall be tax-exempt: (1) tenant-shareholder in the case of a cooperative housing association; (2) owners of condominium housing units in the case of a condominium management association; or (3) owners of real property in the case of a residential real estate management association

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt cooperative housing corporations, condominium management associations, and residential real estate management associations from taxation on certain types of income.
